LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.Billiger
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product data in the feed format of Billiger.de.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Feeds.BilligerProductXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product data in the XML feed format of Billiger.de.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value: You can find registration and technical information for billiger.de here.

LocaleResource.Name: DemoModeHint
LocaleResource.Value: Please take to account this plugin runs in demo mode and only 20 products will be exported. To buy a license for this plugin please visit the SmartStore Community Marketplace.

LocaleResource.Name: ShippingCostAustria.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines the shipping costs to Austria.
